attributes.action: Get British Nationals an ESTA to visit USA when declined travel for no reason
attributes.additional_details:
Having travelled to USA in 2012 and 2014 for family holidays and granted a travel authorised on ESTA progame.
Filled in new ESTA application for family holiday for 2016  and all but 1 family member is not authorised to travel where they have been granted travel authorisation before and family stand to lose several thousand pounds. 
Im a hard working family man with successful business I feel the USA are playing with peoples live as investigation proves this is not just and isolated incident.
attributes.background: Having been granted authorised travel to USA before on previours ESTA .Why on new application of ESTA that travel not authorised when curcumstances not changed..

rejection.details: The ESTA programme is the responsibility of the US Government, not the UK Government or Parliament.
